name: 10-Pcs Sleek Modern Pinky Flatware Silverware Flatware Set
description:
What's Special About This Chic Modern Pinky Flatware Set

Upgrade your dining experience with our Modern Flatware Set - a sleek and stylish 10-piece Nordic style flatware set that is perfect for any occasion. Made from high-quality stainless steel, this flatware set features a modern and minimalist design that will complement any table setting.

Each set includes 2 dinner forks, 2 salad forks, 2 dinner knives, 2 teaspoons, and 2 tablespoons, making it a complete flatware solution for your household. Whether you're hosting a dinner party or simply enjoying a meal with your family, this flatware set is sure to impress.

Crafted with attention to detail, this flatware is inspired by the pinky salt lake in Western Australia and would add a touch of elegance to your dining experience. The sleek design and ergonomic handle make it comfortable to hold and easy to use. Plus, it's dishwasher safe for easy cleaning and maintenance.

 

Type: Flatware Set / Cutlery Set / Silverware Set 

Number of Pieces: 10 pcs in a set, including 2 dinner folks, 2 dinner knives, 2 dinner spoons, 2 tea spoons, 2 dessert folks

Materials: Food Grade Stainless Steel

Maintenance: Dishwasher Safe

Size:
